<H2>
<FONT SIZE="-1">
coreservlets.tags</FONT>
<BR>
Class  RepeatTag</H2>
<PRE>
<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html">java.lang.Object</A>
  |
  +--<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/servlet/2.2/javadoc/javax/servlet/jsp/tagext/TagSupport.html">javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport</A>
        |
        +--<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/servlet/2.2/javadoc/javax/servlet/jsp/tagext/BodyTagSupport.html">javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport</A>
              |
              +--<B>coreservlets.tags.RepeatTag</B>
</PRE>
<HR>
<DL>
<DT>public class <B>RepeatTag</B><DT>extends <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/servlet/2.2/javadoc/javax/servlet/jsp/tagext/BodyTagSupport.html">BodyTagSupport</A></DL>

<P>
A tag that repeats the body the specified
  number of times.
  <P>
  Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages
  from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press,
  http://www.coreservlets.com/.
  &copy; 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.
<P>
<DL>
<DT><B>See Also: </B><DD><A HREF="../../serialized-form.html#coreservlets.tags.RepeatTag">Serialized Form</A></DL>
<HR>

<P>
